flawed_nl_solution:
There are 7 days in a week, so Tony made 1 * 7 = <<1*7=7>>7 sandwiches.
On Saturday, he made 1 extra sandwich, so he made 7 + 1 = <<7+1=10>>10 sandwiches this week.
A sandwich has 2 slices of bread, so he used 10 * 2 = <<10*2=20>>20 slices.
Thus, Tony has 22 - 20 = <<22-20=2>>2 slices of bread left.
#### 2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
